titleStmt.title: A true reporte of the laste voyage into the west and northwest regions, &c. 1577. worthily atchieued by Capteine Frobisher of the sayde voyage the first finder and generall With a description of the people there inhabiting, and other circumstances notable. Written by Dionyse Settle, one of the companie in the sayde voyage, and seruant to the Right Honourable the Earle of Cumberland.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Dionyse.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The last voyage of Capteine Frobisher.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
